ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MAVEN SWEA Survey Rate Omni-Directional Electron Energy Spectra Data Collection

RevisionEvent.Note: Draft metadata created by LFB (ADAPT code), final editing by AK

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: MAVEN Solar Wind Electron Analyzer (SWEA) omni-directional electron energy spectra in units of differential energy flux (eV/cm^2 sec ster eV) at the MAVEN survey telemetry rate. Description of the SWEA instrument can be found on the SWEA home page https://lasp.colorado.edu/maven/science/instrument-package/swea/ and in the SWEA instrument publication https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-015-0232-1.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the Principal Investigator David L. Mitchell for use of these data.

PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Planetary Data System; Space Physics Data Facility

Parameter.Name: Time, center of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Description: Time, center of sample, in TT2000 time base
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, center of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, center of sample, in raw mission elapsed time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Time, center of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Time, center of sample, in Unix time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: Number of two-second accumulations per energy spectrum
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Number of two-second accumulations per energy spectrum

Parameter.Name: Raw instrument counts
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Raw instrument counts (as separate time series)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Raw instrument counts (as separate time series)
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: counts.

Parameter.Name: Calibrated differential energy flux (as spectrogram)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch

Parameter.Name: Calibrated differential energy flux (as overlaid time series)
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: epoch
Parameter.Description: Calibrated differential energy flux (as overlaid time series)
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: diff_en_fluxes.

Parameter.Name: Weighting factor for converting raw counts to raw count rate
Parameter.Description: Weighting factor for converting raw counts to raw count rate

Parameter.Name: Full sensor geometric factor (per anode) at 1.4 keV
Parameter.Description: Full sensor geometric factor (per anode) at 1.4 keV

Parameter.Name: Relative sensitivity as a function of energy
Parameter.Description: Relative sensitivity as a function of energy

Parameter.Name: Number of energy spectra in file
Parameter.Description: Number of energy spectra in file
